name: Suspect: The Run!
summary: Get rid of all obstacles in your path, use the nitro boost to smash through other cars and to destroy barricades! Buy magnets, multipliers and other bonuses to collect even more coins, and put all your skills to get as far as possible, with utter disregard for the traffic rules! Compete against your friends on the online leaderboards and lose yourself in this awesome high-octane treat!
